summary.body: Anyone any idea about the crazy barking dog that was making such a racket about 8am this morning on the Speed side of things? Or was it just a mad bird that sounds like a dog? I've heard pigeons in the barbican that make a noise like a gorilla, so it's not out of the question.
summary.subject: Mad barking dog

summary.body: Does anyone know why there were dogs barking, yelping and whining for over an hour at around 4am this morning? I had a broken nights sleep as the noise was so loud.  When they came nearer to Andrewes House car park I heard voices and it sounded like the dogs were being trained, it occurred to me perhaps as police dogs? Does anyone know if this sounds likely, or was I getting delirious in my slumbers?!  I hope it doesnt happen againwhy cant they do it during more sociable hours? Does anyone have any explanations? Thanks Joni
summary.subject: Dogs Barking!

summary.body: Does anyone know why there were dogs barking, yelping and whining for over an hour at around 4am this morning? I had a broken nights sleep as the noise was so loud.  When they came nearer to Andrewes House car park I heard voices and it sounded like the dogs were being trained, it occurred to me perhaps as police dogs? Does anyone know if this sounds likely, or was I getting delirious in my slumbers?! I clearly heard praising of the dogs, which suggests they were being trained. I will speak to the car park attendant, as it sounded like they were close to his box.  I hope it doesnt happen againthe time of day was very unsociable. Does anyone have any explanations?  Thanks  Joni
summary.subject: Dogs Barking
